creditline: The Simmons Family Endowment for Textiles
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: black ground fabric; embroidered in predominately orange with some red and yellow highlights; central leaf- or feather-like motifs with floral and leaf forms; scrolling leaves or feathers at each end; band of red, orange and green off-center; black netting trim at short ends with black tassels
title: Scarf
